title: Greg Tonoski
author: Greg Tonoski
content: Run an additional Bitcoin node on the 3rd of January 2022 to celebrate the Bitcoin anniversary together. Perhaps, we could mark the anniversary with all-time-high of count of nodes (as shown by: bitnodes.io or coin.dance/nodes). Let's see how robust the Bitcoin network and consensus are.

comments.author: Greg Tonoski
comments.body: Happy 14th anniversary of Bitcoin BTC!The Internet is a brutal, rough and tumble place - Satoshi Nakamoto.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Run a node to celebrate Bitcoin anniversary is good but until dusts are settle from Luke Dash Jr. hack, people should not use Bitcoin Knots wallet.It's a tweet from Luke. https://twitter.com/LukeDashjr/status/1609937505217904642Bitcoin Core wallet is good to run a nodehttps://bitcoincore.org/en/download/[Guide] How to run a Bitcoin Core full node for under 50 bucks!

comments.author: buwaytress
comments.body: Hmm... hack on a dev I would probably have named among the last to ever get hacked. Need to read up on that when I'm back from break.Not the best way to greet the new year but I suppose this is the way Bitcoin usually is a year after ATH, just down in the dumps.Definitely time to recharge and continue the story of stronger fundamentals!
